video_id,

mapper.update:
update video_table
usr_id = #{usrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_play = video_play + #{videoPlay,jdbcType=BIGINT},
video_postime = #{videoPostime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
video_like = video_like + #{videoLike,jdbcType=BIGINT},
video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update video_table set usr_id = #{usrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_play = #{videoPlay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, video_postime = #{videoPostime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, video_like = #{videoLike,jdbcType=BIGINT}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
